data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ribeiro, Felipe Bezerra, Buckup, Ludwig, Gomes, Kelly Martinez, Araujo, Paula Beatriz (2016): Two new species of South American freshwater crayfish genus Parastacus Huxley, 1879 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Parastacidae). Zootaxa 4158 (3): 301-324, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4158.3.1|31 occurrences
